title: India's AI ambitions rooted in intent to build truly inclusive ecosystem: MeitY secretary
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is a general-purpose technology whose true value lies in the breadth of its societal impact, said S KrishnanSecretary, Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology.
content:
New Delhi [India], February 14 (ANI): Artificial Intelligence (AI) is a general-purpose technology whose true value lies in the breadth of its societal impact, said S Krishnan, Secretary of the Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology.

title: AI to outpace all past revolutions; India preparing to lead AI era: Ashwini Vaishnaw
description: Union Minister Ashwini Vaishnaw on Saturday described artificial intelligence as the driver of a “fifth industrial revolution,” asserting that its scale and speed of transformation would surpass all previous technological shifts.
content:

title: China’s ByteDance releases Doubao 2.0 AI chatbot
description: China’s ByteDance has rolled out its Doubao 2.0 chatbot, an upgrade of Doubao which is currently the country’s most widely used artificial intelligence app, according to QuestMobile, the company said on Saturday.
content:
BEIJING, Feb 14 (Reuters) - China’s ByteDance has rolled out its Doubao 2.0 chatbot, an upgrade of Doubao which is currently the country’s most widely used artificial intelligence app, according to QuestMobile, the company said on Saturday.

title: Why dinner for two with my chatbot is the future of Valentine’s Day
description: Artificial intelligence loves you unconditionally, even if you do forget to take the bins out

title: Space domain awareness, autonomous satellites, data centres in orbit - AI opens new world
description: Space engineers in India and across the world are using artificial intelligence to track more than a million orbits of such debris to determine their possible collision with active satellites and space assets
content:
A tiny piece of junk may be harmless on Earth, but even the slightest impact from such debris hurtling through space at high speed can prove fatal for a spacecraft.
